text: Apani baluna. ‘He ah‌le kitabagana! Esa se kathaya ya amadera o tomadera madhye eka'i; yena amara ekamatra allah‌ chara karo ibadata na kari, tamra sathe kono kichuke sarika na kari ebam amadera ke'u allah‌ chara eke an'yake raba hisebe grahana na kari. ’ Tarapara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya tahale tomara bala, tomara saksi thaka ye, niscaya amara musalima [1].’
